DataElement.preferredName: Symptom Distress Scale Outlook Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation of the degree of distress they experience related to their outlook, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms._A question about an individual's fear about the future._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about an individual's fear about the future.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's fear about the future.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Symptom Distress Scale Outlook Score 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric scores from 1 (I am not worried or frightened about the future) to 5 (I am terrified by thoughts of the future) on a Likert scale used on the Symptom Distress Scale questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I am terrified by thoughts of the future

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I am terrified by thoughts of the future
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was terrified by thoughts of the future.

Concepts.longName: Terrified by Thoughts of the Future
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was terrified by thoughts of the future.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was very worried and frightened about things.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was very worried and frightened about things.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I am slightly worried but not frightened about things

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was slightly worried but not frightened about things.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I am not worried or frightened about the future

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure.  The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents.  Where an investigator wants to use single Patient Reported Outcome items that are integrated into a study, DCP review is required prior to inclusion of the item on a case report form.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SDS User's Manual
ReferenceDocuments.description: Documentation of the development, method of administration,  scoring procedures and psychometric properties of the SDS.
